StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetDataSheetEndMonthPoolTotal]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @OrgID int , @FiscalYear int )
AS
BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @CurrentFiscalYear int DECLARE @CurrentTime date.me
SET @CurrentTime = GETDATE()
IF Month(@CurrentTime) > 9 BEGIN SET @CurrentFiscalYear = YEAR(@CurrentTime) + 1 END ELSE BEGIN SET @CurrentFiscalYear = YEAR(@CurrentTime) END
IF @CurrentFiscalYear = @FiscalYear --- use real .me OLTP count instead of snapshot for current FY BEGIN
SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN (p.GENDER_CODE = 'M' AND p.COMPONENT_CODE IN ('K5','PO')) OR (p.COMPONENT_CODE = '11') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS [TotalMonthPoolRmnps] ,SUM(CASE WHEN (p.GENDER_CODE = 'F' AND p.COMPONENT_CODE IN ('K5','PO')) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS [TotalMonthPoolRfnps] ,SUM(CASE WHEN (p.COMPONENT_CODE IN ('K4','K8','K9','B5')) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS [TotalMonthPoolReserves] FROM ( SELECT c.CONTRACT_ID ,m.GENDER_CODE ,c.COMPONENT_CODE
FROM MCRISS.dbo.NWA n INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACT c ON n.NWA_ID = c.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS cs ON cs.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID AND cs.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = (SELECT MAX(CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID) FROM MCRISS.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS WHERE NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID ) INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.MARINE_CANDIDATE m ON n.Marine_Candidate_Id = m.Marine_Candidate_Id WHERE n.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = @OrgID AND (cs.STATUS_TYPE = 'E' AND cs.STATUS_CODE = 'B' AND cs.DISPOSITION_CODE IN ('K', 'M') ) ) AS p
END ELSE -- @CurrentFiscalYear <> @FiscalYear BEGIN
CREATE TABLE #TEMP_END_MONTH_POOL ( CONTRACT_ID int ,GENDER_CODE char(1) ,COMPONENT_CODE varchar(2) ,PADD_DATE date.me )
INSERT INTO #TEMP_END_MONTH_POOL SELECT DISTINCT CONTRACT_ID, GENDER_CODE, COMPONENT_CODE, PADD_DATE FROM [MCRISS_OLAP].[dbo].POOLEES_DATASHEET WHERE RSS_ORG_ID = @OrgID AND ((RPT_YEAR = @FiscalYear-1 AND RPT_MONTH IN (10,11,12)) OR (RPT_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND RPT_MONTH < 10)) AND COMPONENT_CODE IN ('K5','PO','K4','K8','K9','B5','11') AND RPT_MONTH <> PADD_MONTH
SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN (p.GENDER_CODE = 'M' AND p.COMPONENT_CODE IN ('K5','PO')) OR (p.COMPONENT_CODE = '11') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS [TotalMonthPoolRmnps] ,SUM(CASE WHEN (p.GENDER_CODE = 'F' AND p.COMPONENT_CODE IN ('K5','PO')) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS [TotalMonthPoolRfnps] ,SUM(CASE WHEN (p.COMPONENT_CODE IN ('K4','K8','K9','B5')) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS [TotalMonthPoolReserves] FROM #TEMP_END_MONTH_POOL p
DROP TABLE #TEMP_END_MONTH_POOL
END
END
